title: Mai Pagura
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Macrobiotic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Was all-veg but changed ownership in late-2014; current owner maintained the veg menu but also added meat and dairy as well alcohol. Has vegan choices in sandwich, wrap, and burger plus soy milk for coffee and a selection of vegan sweets and brioche.
